verses.1: Topa in Moses a thupiak sa bangin, siangtho munah nasep nadingin amaute in a dum, a dupsan, a ausan khaute tawh limtakin a kigan puan a bawl uh hi. Amaute in Aaron adingin biakna puan siangtho a bawl uh hi.
verses.2: Amaute in siampi puan pen kham, a dum, a dupsan, a ausan tuumul khaute le a kopin a kikhuk a kigan puan hoihte tawh a bawl uh hi.
verses.3: Hoihtakin a kigeel, a dum, a dupsan, a ausan tuumul khaute le a kopin a kikhuk a kigan puan hoihte ah zat dingin kham peek kiseekin khau-in kizen hi.
verses.4: Amaute in siampi puan adingin liangkaih puan bawl uh a, a mong nih tegel ah zom uh hi.
verses.5: Topa in Moses a thupiak sa bangin, amah a gak dingin hoihtakin a kigan tua tunga puan om pen kham, a dum, a dupsan, a ausan tuumul khaute le a kopin a kikhuk a kigan puan hoihte tawh kibawlin, a nate le a sepna zia a kibang ahi hi.
verses.6: Israel tapate a phazah tawh kizui-in, onik suangte kitat a, kham tawh a kizepna sungah a minte kigelhin, min gelh siamteʼ gelh bangin kibawl hi.
verses.7: Topa in Moses a thupiak sa bangin Israel tapate phawkna suang dingin siampi puanʼ liangkaih puan tungah a bulh uh hi.
verses.8: Amaute in kham, a dum, a dupsan, a ausan tuumul khaute le a kopin a kikhuk a kigan puan hoihte tawh, siampi puan a kibawl puan bangin hoihtakin awmdal a bawl uh hi.
verses.9: Tua awmdal a ning kikim a, thuap nihin kibawl a, a kikhep ciangin a dung letmat kua, a vai letmat kua mah a pha hi.
verses.10: Amaute in tua sungah suang gual li bulh uh a, Sardis suang, topaz suang le karbankal suang gual khat pen a gual masa ahi hi.
verses.11: A gual nihna ah emerald suang, sapfaia suang le diamond suang ahi hi.
verses.12: A gual thumna ah jakinth suang, agate suang le amethyst suang ahi hi.
verses.13: A gual lina ah beryl suang, onik suang le jasper suang ahi hi. Kham tawh zepna sungah tua suangte khempeuh kikoih hi.
verses.14: Israel tapate a phazah tawh kituakin amauteʼ min a kigelhna suang sawm le nih om hi. Tua min gelhnate pen minam sawm le nih a huamin a kigelh ahi hi.
verses.15: Amaute in awmdal tungah khau tawh a kibang, a kihual kham citak khainiang a bawl uh hi.
verses.16: Kham tawh a kibawl zepna nih le kham kual nih bawl uh a, awmdal mong nihte ah kham kual nihte a koih uh hi.
verses.17: Amaute in awmdal mongte ah a om kual nihte pen kham khau nihte tawh a khih uh hi.
verses.18: Amaute in zepna nihte tungah khau mong nihte zom uh a, tua bangin amaute in siampi puanʼ liangkaih puan tunga mai lamah a bulh uh hi.
verses.19: Tua ciangin amaute in kham kual nih bawl uh a, siampi puan tawh a kizom a sung lam nawl, awmdal mong nihte ah a bulh uh hi.
verses.20: Amaute in kham kual nih bawl uh a, siampi puanʼ liangkaih puan nihteʼ nuai a mailam, hoihtakin a kigan siampi puanteʼ puan khau a kizopna tung tak ah a bulh uh hi.
verses.21: Topa in Moses a thupiak sa bangin, hoihtakin a kigan siampi puan khau tungah a om theih nading le siampi puan tung panin awmdal a kol theih loh nadingin amaute in siampi puanʼ kualte ah khau dum khatin a kualte tawh awmdal a gak uh hi.
verses.22: Amaute in khau dum bek tawh a kigan siampi puan tualpi zong a bawl uh hi.
verses.23: A kikeek loh nadingin puan tualpi ngawng pen puan ngawng vang bangin a ngawng kimkot ah a zimna om hi.
verses.24: Puan tualpi mongte ah amaute in a dum, a dupsan, a ausan tuumul khaute le a kopin a kikhuk a kigan puan hoih tawh mang kawlsing gahte a bawl uh hi.
verses.25: Topa in Moses a thupiak sa bangin, amaute in kham citak siklongte zong bawl uh a, puan tualpi mong kimkot tunga mang kawlsing gahteʼ kikalah siklongte a koih uh hi.
verses.26: Biak nasep nadinga puan tualpi mong kimkot tungah siklong khat, mang kawlsing gah khat, siklong khat, mang kawlsing gah khat, cih bangin kihelh hi.
verses.27: Topa in Moses a thupiak sa bangin, amaute in Aaron le a tapate adingin khau hoih tawh a kigan puan tungsilhte
verses.28: le khau hoih tawh a kigan dialpi le khau hoih tawh a kigan lukhute, a kopin a kikhuk a kigan puan hoihte tawh a kibawl pheituam hoihte,
verses.29: le a kopin a kikhuk a kigan puan hoihte tawh a kibawl puan kawnggak le phim tawh kikhui-in a kizem a dum, a dupsan, a ausan tuumul puante zong a bawl uh hi.
verses.30: Amaute in kham citak tawh a siangtho kizepna peek khat bawl uh a, min gelhna a kibawl mah bangin tua tungah thu gelhin, “ Topaʼ tungah siangtho,” ci uh hi.
verses.31: Topa in Moses a thupiak sa bangin, amaute in a tunga dialpi tungah a gak dingin tua tungah khau dum khat a vawh uh hi.
verses.32: Tua bangin kikhopna buk ahi biakbuk nasep khempeuh kiman hi. Topa in Moses a thupiak sa khempeuh bangin Israel mite in sem khin uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute man khin uh hi.
verses.33: Amaute in biakbuk, a puanbuk le a nazat khempeuh, a vankhainate, khuampeekte, a zawlte, a khuampite le a bullente;
verses.34: a kisansak tuutal vunte le savun dangte tawh a kibawl khuhna le kong puankhai dalna puan;
verses.35: thuciamna singkuang, a zawlte le hehpihna tokhom tawh;
verses.36: sabuai le a nazat khempeuhte le Ompihna Anlum;
verses.37: kham citak meivak khuam le meivak a kibulh sa tawh a meivakte le a nazatte khempeuh le meivak ading sathau;
verses.38: kham biakna tau, nilh sathau le a namtui paknamtui le puanbuk kongkhak ading kong puankhai;
verses.39: sumngo biakna tau le a sumngo siklen, a zawlte le a nazat khempeuh; kisilna kuang le a ngakna;
verses.40: buktual a puan kikhaite, a khuampite, a bullente le buktual kongpi ading kong puankhai, a khaute le a khetphimte; le kikhopna buk ahi biakbuk nasepna ah a nazat khempeuh;
verses.41: siampi nasep nadingin siangtho mun a zat ding hoihtakin a kibawl puante, siampi Aaron ading biakna puan siangthote le ama tapateʼ puante, Moses kiangah a paipih uh hi.
verses.42: Topa in Moses a thupiak sa khempeuh tawh kituakin Israel mite in nasep khempeuh hih uh hi.
verses.43: Moses in nasep khempeuh vel a, amaute in Topaʼ thupiak sa bangin a bawl khitna a mu hi. Tua ciangin Moses in amaute thupha a pia hi.
